name: Surya Kriya
description: This kriya involves breathing with mantras while facing away from the sun, drawing in solar energy through bindu and spine. Builds Tejas and inner radiance.

name: Tantra course - 2nd kriya - Sex with devoted shishya
englishName: Tantra 2nd kriya - Sex with devoted disciple
translatedName: Divine sexual kriya for vibrational healing and intimacy
description: Sacred union with a devoted disciple, when mutual and natural, enhances the vibrations and healing for both. A deep tantric kriya of shared awakening.

name: Aaj ke baad sickness ke anubhav ko main dobara swikaar nahi karunga
translatedName: I will no longer accept sickness into my reality
description: A declaration to release recurring illness and align fully with divine health. This bhava affirms healing, vitality, and strength.

name: Prakatya second level - transmute any emotion
translatedName: Making an emotion conscious and transforming it
description: You can now fully observe, accept, and alchemize any emotional state by making it 'prakatya'—fully expressed and then released.

name: Spanking - anger or mental argument clearing
translatedName: Clearing anger and illusions through intense truth-speaking
description: A sacred method to speak truth fiercely (like a conscious spanking), chosen with consent and love, to help someone see clearly and grow.

name: Revelation - Gyan gun ka sagar
translatedName: Flooded with divine knowledge and wisdom
description: This bhava brings spontaneous revelation—like a download from higher consciousness, overflowing with divine insights.

name: Imaginations are not as pleasurable/painful as projected
translatedName: Seeing through mental exaggeration of pain and pleasure
description: This bhava gives clarity that mental imagination often amplifies emotions beyond reality. You become free from unnecessary highs and lows.

name: Difficult divine guidance mudra
translatedName: Mudra to receive divine direction during tough moments
description: Interlocking fingers and thumbs in a sacred shape to receive clarity and direction when confused or resistant.

name: Energetic sex mudra
translatedName: Sacred hand gesture to enhance sexual energy flow
description: Forming a circle with interlocked fingers and joined thumbs activates sacred sexual and heart energy. Supports tantric connection.

name: गहन ज्ञान bhava (Gahan Gyan Bhava)
description: Blessing of deep spiritual knowledge. This bhava gives access to profound inner wisdom and divine truths.
englishName: ghn jञn bhava Gahan Gyan Bhava
